ValidationRule.description: To change the stage of an Opportunity to Closed Won, it should have an associated Site Survey and Site Survey Status must be 'Reviewed' (Complete)
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL(StageName,"Signed"), OR( ISBLANK(Site_Survey__c), NOT( TEXT(Site_Survey__r.Status__c) = $Setup.Field_Service_Settings__c.Site_Survey_Reviewed_Status__c )), NOT(Text(PRIORVALUE(StageName)) = 'Signed Awaiting Survey Approval'), CASESAFEID( RecordTypeId ) <> $Setup.Field_Service_Settings__c.Opportunity_RecordType_Frequency_Change__c )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please associate a Site Survey and Submit it for approval before choosing a status of "Signed" for this Opportunity
